attributes.action: Create legislation to cap APR on credit cards at 8% & cap balance transfers on credit cards at 5%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The capping of APR and balance transfers at 8% and 5% would help consumers whom are in debt pay off their cards as well as give the banking industry a FAIR return on their lending. The banks are making billions of pounds by charging extortionate rates on cards & loans, therefore it's time for our government to get the banks to play fair.
